attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the government giving themselves pay rises ,and money for furniture ect,as they do not do a good job .if we proformed in our jobs as they do we would be sacked.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
